verses.verse: וִֽירִיחוֹ֙ <S%H3405><s%> vi-ri-Cho Now Jericho סֹגֶ֣רֶת <S%H5462><s%> so-Ge-ret was straitly וּמְסֻגֶּ֔רֶת <S%H5462><s%> u-me-sug-Ge-ret, shut up מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei because בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein no יוֹצֵ֖א <S%H3318><s%> yo-Tze none went out וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> ve-'Ein one בָּֽא׃ <S%H935><s%> Ba. and none came in ס sa-Mek

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a', unto Joshua רְאֵה֙ <S%H7200><s%> re-'Eh See נָתַ֣תִּי <S%H5414><s%> na-Tat-ti I have given בְיָֽדְךָ֔ <S%H3027><s%> ve-ya-de-Cha, into thine hand אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְרִיח֖וֹ <S%H3405><s%> ye-ri-Cho Jericho וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et מַלְכָּ֑הּ <S%H4428><s%> mal-Kah; and the king גִּבּוֹרֵ֖י <S%H1368><s%> gib-bo-Rei thereof [and] the mighty men הֶחָֽיִל׃ <S%H2428><s%> he-Cha-yil. of valour

וְסַבֹּתֶ֣ם <S%H5437><s%> ve-sab-bo-Tem And ye shall compass אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעִ֗יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir, the city כֹּ֚ל <S%H3605><s%> kol all אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H376><s%> 'an-Shei the men הַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> ham-mil-cha-Mah, of war הַקֵּ֥יף <S%H5362><s%> hak-Keif [and] go round about אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir the city פַּ֣עַם <S%H6471><s%> Pa-'am anvil אֶחָ֑ת <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chat; a כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> koh so תַעֲשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Seh Thus shalt thou do שֵׁ֥שֶׁת <S%H8337><s%> She-shet six יָמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim. days

וְשִׁבְעָ֣ה <S%H7651><s%> ve-shiv-'Ah And seven כֹהֲנִ֡ים <S%H3548><s%> cho-ha-Nim priests יִשְׂאוּ֩ <S%H5375><s%> yis-'U shall bear שִׁבְעָ֨ה <S%H7651><s%> shiv-'Ah seven שׁוֹפְר֤וֹת <S%H7782><s%> shof-Rot trumpets הַיּֽוֹבְלִים֙ <S%H3104><s%> hai-yov-Lim of rams' horns לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before הָאָר֔וֹן <S%H727><s%> ha-'a-Ron, the ark וּבַיּוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> u-vai-yOm day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔י <S%H7637><s%> hash-she-vi-'I, and the seventh תָּסֹ֥בּוּ <S%H5437><s%> ta-Sob-bu ye shall compass אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir the city שֶׁ֣בַע <S%H7651><s%> She-va' seven פְּעָמִ֑ים <S%H6471><s%> pe-'a-Mim; times וְהַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> ve-hak-Ko-ha-Nim, and the priests יִתְקְע֖וּ <S%H8628><s%> yit-ke-'U shall blow בַּשּׁוֹפָרֽוֹת׃ <S%H7782><s%> bash-sho-fa-Rot. with the trumpets

וְהָיָ֞ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become בִּמְשֹׁ֣ךְ׀ <S%H4900><s%> bim-Shoch And it shall come to pass that when they make a long בְּקֶ֣רֶן <S%H7161><s%> be-Ke-ren horn הַיּוֹבֵ֗ל <S%H3104><s%> hai-yo-Vel, [blast] with the ram's; בְּשָׁמְעֲכֶם be-sha-me-'a-chem ככְּשָׁמְעֲכֶם֙ <S%H8085><s%> ke-sha-me-'a-Chem listen קאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Kol the sound הַשּׁוֹפָ֔ר <S%H7782><s%> hash-sho-Far, of the trumpet יָרִ֥יעוּ <S%H7321><s%> ya-Ri-'u shall shout כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am all the people תְּרוּעָ֣ה <S%H8643><s%> te-ru-'Ah shout גְדוֹלָ֑ה <S%H1419><s%> ge-do-Lah; with a great וְנָ֨פְלָ֜ה <S%H5307><s%> ve-Na-fe-Lah shall fall down חוֹמַ֤ת <S%H2346><s%> cho-Mat and the wall הָעִיר֙ <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir of the city תַּחְתֶּ֔יהָ <S%H8478><s%> tach-Tei-ha, flat וְעָל֥וּ <S%H5927><s%> ve-'a-Lu shall ascend up הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am and the people אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every man נֶגְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5048><s%> neg-Do. straight

וַיִּקְרָ֞א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra called יְהוֹשֻׁ֤עַ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a' And Joshua בִּן־ <S%H1121><s%> bin- the son נוּן֙ <S%H5126><s%> nun of Nun אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> hak-Ko-ha-Nim, the priests וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem, to שְׂא֖וּ <S%H5375><s%> se-'U unto them Take up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> a-Ron the ark הַבְּרִ֑ית <S%H1285><s%> hab-be-Rit; of the covenant וְשִׁבְעָ֣ה <S%H7651><s%> ve-shiv-'Ah and let seven כֹֽהֲנִ֗ים <S%H3548><s%> cho-ha-Nim, priests יִשְׂאוּ֙ <S%H5375><s%> yis-'U bear שִׁבְעָ֤ה <S%H7651><s%> shiv-'Ah seven שֽׁוֹפְרוֹת֙ <S%H7782><s%> shof-rOt trumpets יוֹבְלִ֔ים <S%H3104><s%> yov-Lim, of rams' horns לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before אֲר֥וֹן <S%H727><s%> a-Ron the ark יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וַיֹּאמְרוּ vai-yo-me-ru כוַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer answer קאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am, unto the people עִבְר֖וּ <S%H5674><s%> 'iv-Ru Pass on וְסֹ֣בּוּ <S%H5437><s%> ve-Sob-bu and compass אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעִ֑יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir; the city וְהֶ֣חָל֔וּץ <S%H2502><s%> ve-He-cha-Lutz, and let him that is armed יַעֲבֹ֕ר <S%H5674><s%> ya-'a-Vor pass on לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before אֲר֥וֹן <S%H727><s%> a-Ron the ark יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi, become כֶּאֱמֹ֣ר <S%H559><s%> ke-'e-Mor had spoken יְהוֹשֻׁעַ֮ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-shu-a' And it came to pass when Joshua אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָעָם֒ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am unto the people וְשִׁבְעָ֣ה <S%H7651><s%> ve-shiv-'Ah that the seven הַכֹּהֲנִ֡ים <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-ha-Nim priests נֹשְׂאִים֩ <S%H5375><s%> no-se-'Im bearing שִׁבְעָ֨ה <S%H7651><s%> shiv-'Ah the seven שׁוֹפְר֤וֹת <S%H7782><s%> shof-Rot trumpets הַיּֽוֹבְלִים֙ <S%H3104><s%> hai-yov-Lim of rams' horns לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, the LORD עָבְר֕וּ <S%H5674><s%> 'a-ve-Ru passed on וְתָקְע֖וּ <S%H8628><s%> ve-ta-ke-'U and blew בַּשּֽׁוֹפָר֑וֹת <S%H7782><s%> bash-sho-fa-Rot; with the trumpets וַֽאֲרוֹן֙ <S%H727><s%> va-'a-rOn and the ark בְּרִ֣ית <S%H1285><s%> be-Rit of the covenant יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, of the LORD הֹלֵ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ho-Lech followed אַחֲרֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-rei-Hem. them

וְהֶחָל֣וּץ <S%H2502><s%> ve-he-cha-Lutz And the armed הֹלֵ֔ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ho-Lech, men went לִפְנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> hak-Ko-ha-Nim, the priests; תָּקְעוּ ta-ke-'u כתֹּקְעֵ֖י <S%H8628><s%> to-ke-'Ei blew קהַשּֽׁוֹפָר֑וֹת <S%H7782><s%> hash-sho-fa-Rot; with the trumpets וְהַֽמְאַסֵּ֗ף <S%H622><s%> ve-ham-'as-Sef, and the rereward הֹלֵךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> ho-leCh came אַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei after הָאָר֔וֹן <S%H727><s%> ha-'a-Ron, the ark הָל֖וֹךְ <S%H1980><s%> ha-Loch [the priests] going on וְתָק֥וֹעַ <S%H8628><s%> ve-ta-Ko-a' and blowing בַּשּׁוֹפָרֽוֹת׃ <S%H7782><s%> bash-sho-fa-Rot. with the trumpets

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הָעָם֩ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am the people צִוָּ֨ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah had commanded יְהוֹשֻׁ֜עַ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a' And Joshua לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor תָרִ֙יעוּ֙ <S%H7321><s%> ta-Ri-'u Ye shall not shout וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- nor תַשְׁמִ֣יעוּ <S%H8085><s%> tash-Mi-'u nor make any noise אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- קוֹלְכֶ֔ם <S%H6963><s%> kol-Chem, with your voice וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- nor יֵצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> ye-Tze proceed מִפִּיכֶ֖ם <S%H6310><s%> mip-pi-Chem out of your mouth דָּבָ֑ר <S%H1697><s%> da-Var; neither shall [any] word עַ֠ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad until י֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom until the day אָמְרִ֧י <S%H559><s%> 'a-me-Ri I bid אֲלֵיכֶ֛ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Chem about הָרִ֖יעוּ <S%H7321><s%> ha-Ri-'u you shout וַהֲרִיעֹתֶֽם׃ <S%H7321><s%> va-ha-ri-'o-Tem. then shall ye shout

וַיַּסֵּ֤ב <S%H5437><s%> vai-yas-Sev compassed אֲרוֹן־ <S%H727><s%> 'a-ron- So the ark יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir, the city הַקֵּ֖ף <S%H5362><s%> hak-Kef going about פַּ֣עַם <S%H6471><s%> Pa-'am anvil אֶחָ֑ת <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chat; they וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo-'u and they came הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <S%H4264><s%> ham-ma-cha-Neh, into the camp וַיָּלִ֖ינוּ <S%H3885><s%> vai-ya-Li-nu and lodged בַּֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <S%H4264><s%> Bam-ma-cha-Neh. in the camp פ Peh

וַיַּשְׁכֵּ֥ם <S%H7925><s%> vai-yash-Kem rose early יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a' And Joshua בַּבֹּ֑קֶר <S%H1242><s%> bab-Bo-ker; in the morning וַיִּשְׂא֥וּ <S%H5375><s%> vai-yis-'U took up הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-ha-Nim and the priests אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֲר֥וֹן <S%H727><s%> a-Ron the ark יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וְשִׁבְעָ֣ה <S%H7651><s%> ve-shiv-'Ah And seven הַכֹּהֲנִ֡ים <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-ha-Nim priests נֹשְׂאִים֩ <S%H5375><s%> no-se-'Im bearing שִׁבְעָ֨ה <S%H7651><s%> shiv-'Ah seven שׁוֹפְר֜וֹת <S%H7782><s%> shof-Rot trumpets הַיֹּבְלִ֗ים <S%H3104><s%> hai-yoe-Lim, of rams' horns לִפְנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> a-Ron the ark יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, of the LORD הֹלְכִ֣ים <S%H1980><s%> ho-le-Chim went on הָל֔וֹךְ <S%H1980><s%> ha-Loch, continually וְתָקְע֖וּ <S%H8628><s%> ve-ta-ke-'U and blew בַּשּׁוֹפָר֑וֹת <S%H7782><s%> bash-sho-fa-Rot; with the trumpets וְהֶחָלוּץ֙ <S%H2502><s%> ve-he-cha-Lutz and the armed men הֹלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ho-Lech went לִפְנֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> lif-nei-Hem, before וְהַֽמְאַסֵּ֗ף <S%H622><s%> ve-ham-'as-Sef, them but the rereward הֹלֵךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> ho-leCh came אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei after אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> a-Ron the ark יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, of the LORD; הֹולֵךְ ho-lech כהָלֹ֖וךְ <S%H1980><s%> ha-Loch came קוְתָק֥וֹעַ <S%H8628><s%> ve-ta-Ko-a' and blowing בַּשּׁוֹפָרֽוֹת׃ <S%H7782><s%> bash-sho-fa-Rot. with the trumpets
